name: klasa-tags
description: A klasa plugin to add tag functionality to bots

scripts.test:lint: yarn tslint 'src/*.ts' && yarn eslint --config .eslintrcmd.json --ext md guides && yarn markdownlint guides README.md
scripts.docs: yarn build && yarn dg --source dist --custom guides/.docconfig.json --output dist/docs.json --logging

author: bdistin
